item.title: Making gates teleport you somewhere
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

ok, so here is my code currently…

case 1596:// gates to agility desert
case 1597: // gates to agility desert
if(absY == 3182 || absY == 3183 && absX == 2815 && objectX == 2816 && objectY == 3182 || objectY == 3183) {
teleportToX = 2816;
teleportToY = 3182;
heightLevel = 0;
sendMessage("You enter the gates, have fun!");
} else if(absY == 3182 || absY == 3183 && absX == 2816 && objectX == 2816 && objectY == 3182 || objectY == 3183) {
teleportToX = 2815;
teleportToY = 3182;
} else {
sendMessage("stand next to the gate otherwise you cannot use it!");
} //
break;

Ok, the problem is that whichever side i stand it teleports me thru the gate, and never back…even though i put if your on coord X 2816 you should be teleported back through the gate…and not where you already are =/.

Anyone help??[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 28, 2008, 10:05:31 AM[/size][hr]Standing on neither of the coords works when it saysstand next to the gate to use it…but whichever side you stand it teles you through it…and never back…

someone plzzz help??? Thanks!

Read full topic
